name: Cannon Master Go! Free - Addictive Physics Arcade Game
name_original: Cannon Master Go! Free - Addictive Physics Arcade Game
description:
Use cannon balls and timer bombs to eliminate all Monsters. Hit, smash, explode or fire them up - it's your choice. Expend your ammunition sparingly to achieve best scores and 3 stars.

Have you played physics games before? We know it will not be too hard for you to complete all 20 levels, but do you have what it takes to collect 3 stars on all of them? You will enjoy the amazing graphics, relaxing music and intense enviroment sounds.

Simple cannon balls will help you to crash construction, timer-based bombs will allow you to reach inaccessible places. Different obstacles like barrels, TNT-boxes or bonfires will help you and complicate tasks at same time.

Get ready to Master the Cannon !
